description: Crystal Dynamics has laid off another 30 workers in a restructuring today, making this the third wave of layoffs this year.

description: IGN has interviewed Horizon Steel Frontiers developer NCSoft to find out more about the surprise PC and mobile - but not PlayStation - MMORPG.
title: Horizon Steel Frontiers Interview With NCSoft — Is Aloy in the Game? How Will It Work on PC? and What About Those Stylized Characters?

description: Everything you need to know about Walmart's first Black Friday 2025 event, including how to get early access, when it starts, and more.

description: Get your very own limited-edition Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 artwork from Yoshitaka Amano, the artist behind the iconic Final Fantasy series art.
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 x Yoshitaka Amano Collaboration Now Available on IGN Store

author: Christian Wait
description: Sonic Superstars, Mania, and Frontiers are all discounted on Nintendo Switch (and Switch 2-ready). Early Black Friday gaming deals are also live, including a Corsair Vengeance RTX 5070 Ti liquid-cooled gaming PC for $2,072, an Acer Nitro V RTX 4050 laptop for $635, and a renewed PS5 Pro for $662.
title: Deals for Today: Sonic Game Sale On Nintendo Switch And Early PC Gaming Black Friday Deals

author: Lex Briscuso
description: Setting the ghostbusting record straight, once and for all, is comedy legend Dan Aykroyd, who playfully confirmed that his appearance as Ghostbusters character Ray Stantz in 1995 film Casper is, in fact, canon to the world of Ivan Reitman’s 1984 classic.
title: Dan Aykroyd Confirms His 1995 Casper Cameo as Ray Stantz Is, In Fact, Ghostbusters Canon

author: Tom Jorgensen
description: Osgood Perkins’ latest dark trip has a powerful Tatiana Maslany performance and cool aesthetics to thank for keeping Keeper from getting completely lost in the woods.
title: Keeper - Movie Review

author: Robert Anderson
description: With new universes to explore and highly-anticipated sequels, November is packed with fantastic reads in all genres. Here are our top picks.
title: These Are the 10 Best Books to Look Out for in November 2025

author: Christian Wait
description: Walmart’s Pokémon TCG Black Friday drops start today with new ex Special Collection Boxes for $24.99, each packed with eight booster packs from sets like Destined Rivals and Twilight Masquerade. Walmart+ members get 5-hour early access, and annual memberships are now half price at $49.
title: Walmart's Pokémon TCG Black Friday Drops Start Today, Here's What's Up for Grabs

author: Tom Phillips
description: Disney boss Bob Iger has said the company's streaming service will soon allow subscribers to create and view AI-generated content.
title: Disney+ Will Soon Feature AI-Generated User Content

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: With GTA VI now pushed six more months into November of 2026, we’ve been asking a lot of questions about how the movement of such a gaming juggernaut is impacting the rest of the industry. And one analyst brought up an interesting thought experiment: could GTA VI’s delay also result in the delay of the next generation of consoles?
title: Could the GTA 6 Delay Also Delay Next-Gen Consoles?

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: VR developer VRWOOD is "exploring all possible options" to protect its IP after claiming that HoYoverse's upcoming Animal Crossing-like game, Petit Planet, bears "striking similarities" to its own game, Little Planet.
title: HoYoverse's Animal Crossing-like Petit Planet Has 'Striking Similarities' to Early Access VR Game Little Planet, Dev Alleges

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: It was reported today that prolific anime director Tatsuya Nagamine passed away this summer. He was in his early 50s. Nagamine worked on many popular Toei Animation series including ONE PIECE, Dragon Ball, Digimon, Precure and Saint Seiya.
title: Tributes for One Piece and Dragon Ball Anime Director Tatsuya Nagamine, Who Has Passed Away

author: Jesse Schedeen
description: South Park Season 28 quickly bounces back with “Sora Not Sorry,” a hilarious takedown of AI and the disinformation age.
title: South Park Season 28, Episode 3: "Sora, Not Sorry" Review

description: Rockstar's cowboy classic Red Dead Redemption is now cleared for launch on Nintendo Switch 2, PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X/S.
title: Red Dead Redemption Coming to Nintendo Switch 2, PS5 and Xbox Series X/S, New Rating Suggests

author: Lex Briscuso
description: The search is on. The official trailer for the latest SpongeBob offering, The SpongeBob Movie: Search For Squarepants, has officially hit above sea level direct from Paramount — and needless to say, this looks like another fun ride with our favorite sponge.
title: The SpongeBob Movie: Search For SquarePants Gets First Trailer With an Unexpected Cameo

author: Wes Davis
title: Dbrand Is Making a Steam Machine Companion Cube Enclosure, Obviously

description: Amazon has released a new trailer for Fallout Season 2 that gives us our best look yet at the upcoming Prime Video show.
title: New Fallout Season 2 Trailer Shows Deathclaw Fight, Mr. House, and Elvis Ghouls in New Vegas

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Jujutsu Kaisen’s official X account has issued a stern warning to fans, reminding them that recording parts of movies in theaters in Japan can result in a hefty punishment. This comes after illegally recorded footage and images of the new anime film Jujutsu Kaisen: Execution were posted on the internet.
title: Jujutsu Kaisen: Execution Theatergoers in Japan Warned They Could Face Up to 10 Years in Prison or $65,000 Fine for Recording the New Anime Movie

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: The Wheel of Time actress Rosamund Pike has expressed her hope that the Amazon series continues elsewhere at some point following its cancelation, but ultimately has resigned herself to defeat, admitting: “I think we have to accept that it's over.”
title: The Wheel of Time Star Rosamund Pike Wonders Whether Amazon Would Have Canceled the Show Had It Been as Good as Season 3 From the Start, but Insists: 'I Think We Have to Accept That It's Over'

author: Tom Phillips
description: An extended trailer for Pokémon Pokopia has offered a deep dive into the upcoming Animal Crossing-like life sim, and a curious first-look at some new Pokémon designs.
title: Pokémon Pokopia Trailer Showcases Animal Crossing-Style Gameplay — Plus A Mysterious Pale Pikachu, Mossy Snorlax and Professor Tangrowth

author: Tom Phillips
description: Marvel star Elizabeth Olsen has told fans not to expect her return in Avengers: Doomsday, despite the actress being keen to reprise her role as Wanda Maximoff, the Scarlet Witch.
title: 'I Just Have No Idea How or When': Marvel's Scarlet Witch Star Elizabeth Olsen 'Keen' To Return, But Plays Down Hopes For Avengers: Doomsday

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Monarch: Legacy of Monsters Season 2 teaser trailer confirms release date, Kurt Russel’s return, and a Titan from the sea.
title: Monarch: Legacy of Monsters Season 2 Teaser Trailer Confirms Release Date, Kurt Russel's Return, and a Titan From the Sea

author: Vikki Blake
description: An all-new original animated series based on Hideo Kojima's Death Stranding series is coming to Disney+. It has the working title of Death Stranding Isolations.
title: Death Stranding Anime Series Confirmed for Disney+ in 2027, Concept Art by Ghost in the Shell: SAC_2045 Character Designer Released

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 and Space Marine 3 are not competing for resources internally at Saber Interactive, one of its chief developers has insisted.
title: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 and Space Marine 3 Are 'Definitely Not Competing for Resources,' Dev Insists While Remaining Coy About Necrons in the Sequel

author: Vikki Blake
description: Konami has introduced a number of big combat changes to Silent Hill f, including a new casual action difficulty and a reduction in the number of unskippable combat encounters. Check out the update 1.10 patch notes.
title: New Silent Hill f Patch Makes NG+ Runs Less Punishing With Fewer Unskippable Combat Encounters, Faster Stamina Regen, Plus A New Casual Action Difficulty

author: Vikki Blake
description: Death Stranding and Metal Gear creator Hideo Kojima has issued a statement distancing himself from an Italian cartoonist after deleting a photo of the pair meeting at the Lucca Comics And Games 2025 convention earlier in November.
title: Metal Gear Creator Hideo Kojima Issues Official Statement Distancing Himself From Italian Cartoonist After Now-Deleted Photo Sparked a Backlash

author: Tom Phillips
description: Apple's just-announced iPhone Pocket accessory has been mocked over its $230 price point and threadbare nature — which has been described as simply being a ribbed fabric "sock."
title: Apple's $230 iPhone Pocket 'Sock' Ridiculed For Looking Like Borat's Mankini

author: Robert Anderson
description: Amazon has an incredible selection of DC Comics discounted ahead of the Black Friday sales. Start reading the brilliant Absolute series, and score three comics for the price of two.
title: Absolute Batman Vol. 1 and More Comics Included in Amazon's Latest Buy 2 Get 1 Free Sale

author: Tom Phillips
description: FX has detailed its plans for the second season of hit feudal Japan series Shogun, including a list of new cast members and several hints at its plot.
title: 'We Killed a Lot of People': FX Confirms Shogun Season 2 Plot Details and New Cast, as Story Leaps Forward 10 Years

description: Microsoft gaming boss Phil Spencer has welcomed Valve’s next-gen Steam machine in a congratulatory message to Valve.

description: LEGO makes great building sets, but they can be on the expensive side. These are the best LEGO sets available right now for under $25.

description: Despite frustrating plotting and uneven execution, Netflix's The Beast in Me is stacked with great performances by a solid cast that ultimately make the show worth a watch.

description: A very popular EDC flashlight that normally retails for $50-$70.
title: The Compact Yet Powerful Sofirn SP36 Pro 8,000-Lumen LED Flashlight Drops Below $30 for Black Friday
